data.title: 学习Angular2的练习
data.content: 最近开始学习Angular2，为了边学边练，本站采用Angular2框架进行练习开发。学习如何基于 Angular 构建应用程序，并复用代码和技能来构建适用于所有平台的应用。比如： Web 应用、移动 Web 应用、原生移动应用和原生桌面应用等。

data.title: 10年前的编译的linux系统
data.content: 这是十年前编译的Blfs系统，如今开始转战JS。但记得：Linux From Scratch (LFS) is a project that provides you with step-by-step instructions for building your own customized Linux system entirely from source.Beyond Linux From Scratch (BLFS) is a project that continues where the LFS book finishes. It assists users in developing their systems according to their needs by providing a broad range of instructions for installing and configuring various packages on top of a base LFS system.

data.title: AOT与JIT对照
data.content: 这是利用webpack打包在线编译(JIT)与离线编译(AOT)的包大小对照图。

data.title: JIT探测图
data.content: 这是Angular2在线编译(JIT)探测图，打包采用webpack，可与下图对照。

data.title: AOT探测图
data.content: 这是Angular2离线编译(AOT)探测图，打包采用webpack，可与上图对照。
